```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
key <- read.csv(here("data", "raw_data", "nutrient_key_april_23.csv")) %>% 
  select(Sample.ID, Factor.1, Factor.2) %>% 
  rename(plot = Factor.1,
         location = Factor.2)

nutrients <- read.csv(here("data", "raw_data", "nutrients_april_23.csv"), skip = 5) %>% 
  select(!WAL.. & !X..Anion & !X..Cation & !Notes & !X & !X.1 & !X.2) %>% 
  filter(row_number() != 1) %>% 
  mutate(burial_date = ymd(Burial.Date),
         retrieval_date = ymd(Retrieval.Date)) %>% 
  select(!Burial.Date & !Retrieval.Date) %>% 
  left_join(key, by = "Sample.ID") %>% 
  select(!Sample.ID)

write.csv(nutrients, here("data", "clean_data", "nutrients_clean.csv"))
```
